definitions.body: occupation, business, [[מַה מְּלַאכְתְְּ]] what is thy occupation Jon 1:8; business of a steward Ge 39:11 (J); diligent in business Pr 22:29; slack in business Pr 18:9.

property in which one is occupied, [[רעהוּ]] ´[[מ]] his neighbour's property Ex 22:7, Ex 22:10 (E); possessions of herds and flocks Ge 33:14 (J), 1Sa 15:9 (cf. [[מִקְנֶה]]); [[רבה]] ´[[מ]] great property 2Ch 17:13.
work as something done or made:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of God in creation Ge 2:2, Ge 2:2, Ge 2:3 (P), in judgment Je 50:25, in general Ps 73:28.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of men, [[עור]] ´[[מ]] leather-work Le 13:48, Le 13:51 (P), [[השׂדה]] ´[[מ]] work in the field 1Ch 27:26; in building Pr 24:27 + , the walls of Jerusalem Ne 4:5 + , making the tabernacle and its furniture Ex 36:2 + , the temple 1Ki 5:30 + ; work of the potter Je 18:3, of the seaman Ps 107:23, of the Levites 1Ch 26:29, of priests in the sacrifices 2Ch 29:34; † [[עֲבׂדָה]]([[הָ]]) [[מְלָאכֶת]] phrase of P, Ex 35:24, Ex 36:1, Ex 36:3, Le 23:7, Le 23:8, Le 23:21, Le 23:25, Le 23:35, Le 23:36, Nu 28:18, Nu 28:25, Nu 28:26, Nu 29:1, Nu 29:12, Nu 29:35 also 1Ch 9:13, 1Ch 9:19, 1Ch 28:13, 1Ch 28:20, 2Ch 24:12; [[לעבדה]] ´[[המ]] 1Ch 23:24; ´[[עבדה למ]] Ex 36:5 (P); cf. the phrase ´[[עׂשֵׂה המ]] workmen Ezr 3:9, Ne 2:16; ´[[עׂשִׂים במ]] 1Ki 5:30, 1Ki 9:23 + ; ´[[כל מ]] any work forbidden on the Sabbath Ex 20:9, Ex 20:10, Le 23:3 (P) De 5:13, De 5:14, Je 17:22, Je 17:24; on holy convocations Ex 12:16, Le 16:29, Le 23:28, Le 23:30, Le 23:31, Nu 29:7 (P). †
workmanship, [[כל מלאכה]] in every kind of workmanship, phrase of P: Ex 31:3, Ex 31:5, Ex 35:29, Ex 35:31, Ex 35:33, Ex 35:35; and Chr: 1Ch 22:15, 1Ch 28:21, 1Ch 29:5; 1Ki 7:14. †
service, use Le 7:24, Le 11:32, Ju Jdg 16:11, Ez Eze 28:13. †
